function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Irregular circadian rhythm and concomitant pathologies weaken the immune system, increasing susceptibility to infectious diseases.","Impact":"Higher risk of infection and severe illness for individuals with weakened immune systems.","Mitigation":"Promote healthy sleep patterns and lifestyle choices to strengthen the immune system.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Individuals with irregular circadian rhythms or concomitant pathologies","Owner":"Health organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Lack of detailed strategies for social distancing and maximum occupancy in buildings, increasing the risk of airborne cross-infection.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of airborne transmission of diseases within building spaces.","Mitigation":"Implement specific policies and protocols for maximum occupancy and restricted access to common areas.","Technologies":"Building occupancy monitoring systems, access control systems","People":"Building occupants, building managers, policy makers","Owner":"Building management, policy makers"},{"Description":"Buildings viewed as facilitators of disease spread due to inadequate policies and measures, increasing the risk of disease transmission within built environments.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread within buildings, leading to public health concerns.","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce proper policies and measures for disease transmission prevention within buildings.","Technologies":"Building ventilation systems, air filtration systems, contactless technologies for access and interaction","People":"Building occupants, public health authorities, policy makers","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"}]}
